description: From Latin de- + odorans, present participle of odorare (“to smell”), from odor (“a smell”); see odor.

entries.meaning: acting or including an agent to eliminate, reduce, mask, or control odor

definitionGroups.group: Any agent acting to eliminate, reduce, mask, or control odor.

entries.meaning: An odor-controlling substance applied to the underarm to counteract odor from perspiration.
